titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued to promote public awareness of, and additional research relating to, scleroderma.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 12/6/2007--Introduced. Calls for the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend, and the United States Postal Service to issue, a commemorative postage stamp to promote public awareness of, and additional research relating to, scleroderma.
